original_text: When they had brought these kings to Joshua, he summoned all the men of Israel and said to the army commanders who had come with him, “Come here and put your feet on the necks of these kings.” So they came forward and placed their feet on their necks.
korean_text: 그 왕들을 여호수아에게로 끌어내매 여호수아가 이스라엘 모든 사람을 부르고 자기와 함께 갔던 지휘관들에게 이르되 가까이 와서 이 왕들의 목을 발로 밟으라 하매 그들이 가까이 가서 그들의 목을 밟으매

sentences.original_text: When they had brought these kings to Joshua
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이 왕들을 여호수아에게 데려왔을 때

sentences.original_text: he summoned all the men of Israel
and said to the army commanders
and put your feet on the necks of these kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 왕들의 목 위에 너희 발을 올려놓아라

sentences.original_text: and placed their feet on their necks
